auct: can iterate faster and create more
about1: Traditional gatekeepers become irrelevant when the tools are the credentials. Because I can, and this is fucking cool = computational creative sovereignty. Textiles are infrastructure technology. They're how humans learned to manipulate materials at scale, create complex patterns, execute precise measurements, build flexible but durable structures, develop mass production techniques, establish trade networks, create standardized units of value. The fact that we also use them for warmth, beauty, status, and carrying stuff - those are applications of the technology, not the technology itself.
collab: FOR ENCRYPTED ON-CHAIN SALES WE FORK, USE AND COLLABORATE WITH
marquee: ⚡ Pattern libraries for people who read error logs ⚡
keys: Industrial sewing machines for people who think Figma loads slow. GPU clusters that don't ask what you're training. 3D print prototypes while your patterns compile. NYC because Berlin's infrastructure isn't ready yet.
exp: Experience the future of fashion through our curated digital runway shows. Each collection represents the intersection of technology, art, and haute couture.

date: AND TO STAY UP TO DATE WITH NEW RELEASES, ARTICLES, COINS AND WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE.
